content: continue working on the other side like a spiral now in the rest of the 11 sts make 1 half_double_crochet in each st across 27 sts *work in the front loop for round 2 only row 2-26 chain 1 turn make 1 half_double_crochet in each st across 27 sts *work in the back loop for round 27 only row 27 chain 1 turn make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 11 sts in the next 5 sts make 1 half_double_crochet inv decrease 1 half_double_crochet and 1 half_double_crochet inv decrease now in the rest of the 11 sts make 1 half_double_crochet in each st across 25 sts *fasten_off and sew the edges together pillows white make 2 row 1 chain 11 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each chain across 10 sts row 2-12 chain 1 turn make 1 half_double_crochet in each st across 10 sts *fasten_off and sew the edges together to make the pillow make sure to stuff sew them to the couch blanket white row 1 chain 29 start in the ninth chain from the hook make 1 double_crochet then chain 3 skip 3 chain s and make 1 double_crochet in the next chain repeat across 6 double_crochet *work the last double_crochet of the row into the loop row 2-10 chain 6 turn make 1 double_crochet into the top of the double_crochet you made in the previous row then chain 3 skip 3 chain s and make 1 double_crochet in the next double_crochet repeat across 6 double_crochet *fasten_off and sew the blanket to the back of the couch link to video https //youtu be/2_7ankluexo if you need help or have any questions feel free to message me i will respond as soon as possible and answer or clarify any questions you may have
